name: Insurance Claim Fraud Detection App for Business Users
description: Predict Fraudulent Healthcare Insurance Claims using trained ML Model

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction img-head\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003cimg src\u003d\"data:image/svg+xml;base64,\u003d\" alt\u003d\"\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eHealthcare Insurance Claims Fraud Prediction App\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eOverview\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cp\u003e\r\n      This application enables healthcare insurance analysts and business users to detect potential fraudulent claims using machine learning-based classification models. It leverages historical claim data to uncover suspicious patterns, helping insurers take proactive actions. The app streamlines fraud detection, reduces manual effort, and improves the accuracy of claim assessments.\r\n    \u003c/p\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eInput\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e  healthcare insurance claim Data\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Trained Model Name\u003c/li\u003e\r\n     \r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eOutput\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Predicted classifications indicating potential fraudulent claims\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Model performance insights on the uploaded dataset\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Visual comparison of actual vs predicted outcomes\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Charts and analytics highlighting anomalies and fraud patterns\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eBenefits\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Enhances fraud detection accuracy using data-driven insights\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Reduces financial losses by identifying suspicious claims early\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Accelerates investigation workflows by automating pre-screening\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Improves operational efficiency in healthcare insurance processing\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [

        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-bottom:1px solid #E0E0E0;margin-left:-16px;margin-right:-16px;\"\u003e\u003c/div\u003e",

      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eHealthcare Insurance Claims Fraud Prediction\r\n\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eFill model name and your data to get prediction.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n  \r\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Evaluation File",
      "description": "The data should have the columns: Organization, Gender, City \u0026 State, Encounters, Amount, Method, Duration, Transfers, and Outstanding.",

    },
    {
      "key": "fieldSet",
      "type": "fieldset",
      "label": "Field Set",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "components": [
        {
          "label": "Columns",
          "columns": [
            {
              "components": [
                {
                  "label": "Features",
                  "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
                  "description": "Select the features that were used in model training\r\n",
                  "disabled": true,
                  "tableView": false,
                  "defaultValue": {
                    "ORGANIZATION": true,
                    "GENDER": true,
                    "CITY": true,
                    "STATE": true,
                    "ENCOUNTERS": true,
                    "AMOUNT": true,
                    "METHOD": true,
                    "Duration": true,
                    "TRANSFERS": true,
                    "OUTSTANDING": true
                  },
                  "values": [
                    {
                      "label": "ORGANIZATION",
                      "value": "ORGANIZATION",
                      "shortcut": ""
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "GENDER",
                      "value": "GENDER",
                      "shortcut": ""
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "CITY",
                      "value": "CITY",
                      "shortcut": ""
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "STATE",
                      "value": "STATE",
                      "shortcut": ""
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "ENCOUNTERS",
                      "value": "ENCOUNTERS",
                      "shortcut": ""
                    },
                    {

                      "value": "AMOUNT",
                      "shortcut": ""

                    {
                      "label": "METHOD",
                      "value": "METHOD",
                      "shortcut": ""
                    },

                      "label": "Duration",

                      "shortcut": ""

                    {
                      "label": "TRANSFERS",
                      "value": "TRANSFERS",
                      "shortcut": ""
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "OUTSTANDING",
                      "value": "OUTSTANDING",
                      "shortcut": ""
                    }
                  ],
                  "calculateValue": "debugger;\nif(instance.previousData.modelFeaturesData \u0026\u0026 data.model){\n  featureData \u003d instance.previousData.modelFeaturesData.filter(res\u003d\u003e{\n    if(res.name \u003d\u003d data.model \u0026\u0026 res.path \u003d\u003d data.model) {\n        return res;\n    }\n  });\n  value \u003d featureData[0].features;\n}",
                  "key": "x",
                  "properties": {
                    "isMlFeatures": "true"
                  },
                  "type": "selectboxes",
                  "input": true,
                  "inputType": "checkbox",
                  "hideOnChildrenHidden": false
                }
              ],
              "width": 6,
              "offset": 0,
              "push": 0,
              "pull": 0,
              "size": "md",
              "currentWidth": 6
            },
            {
